documentation.author: Cerner
documentation.purpose: To allow a user to manual add a patient to the list of high risk patients.
documentation.explanation: This rule is to suggest the readmission prevention IPOC to clinicians. The rule will indicate on the work list that a patient is at risk for readmission.
documentation.citation: The US Department of Health and Human Services has made reducing hospital readmissions, particularly among people 65 and older, a top priority for improving quality and cutting costs. Last month, the agency released a state-by-state list of hospitals ranked by the percentage of Medicare patients who were treated for one of three key conditions -- heart attack, heart failure or pneumonia -- discharged, and then hospitalized again, for any cause, within 30 days.

templateDefinitions.name: EKS_SYNCH_TRIGGER_E
templateDefinitions.definition: the Expert Synch trigger is listed in TRIGGER.

statements.statement: select trigger_name="Double click in lower box to enter trigger name(s)" from (dummyt d with seq = 1)

templateDefinitions.name: EKS_STOP_LOGIC_L
templateDefinitions.definition: the following templates are false, MODE logic evaluation
templateDefinitions.description: Used to control efficiency of Action Group rules

templateDefinitions.name: EKS_PARSE_DYNAMIC_PARAMS_L
templateDefinitions.definition: Parse parameter string in PARAM_STRING for use in OPT_TEMPLATE_SECTION Template number OPT_TEMPLATE_NUMBER
templateDefinitions.description: Parse a string of dynamic parameters to be used by subsequent templates

statements.statement:
select action = if (d.seq = 1) "Logic" elseif (d.seq = 2) "Action" ENDIF, _hidden = if (d.seq = 1) "L" elseif (d.seq = 2) "A" ENDIF
FROM (DUMMYT D WITH SEQ = VALUE(2))

templateDefinitions.name: EKS_ENCOUNTER_DETAIL_L
templateDefinitions.definition: the patient's ENC_DETAIL QUAL DETAIL_VALUE for the same encounter as OPT_LINK

templateDefinitions.name: EKS_CE_RESULTA_MOST_RECENT_L
templateDefinitions.definition: the most recent result for EVENT_SET_NAME is EVALUATION VALUE1 for the same encounter as OPT_LINK over the last OPT_TIME_NUM OPT_TIME_UNIT

statements.statement: SELECT IF (PAR1="ALL") from nomenclature n,code_value cv plan cv where cv.code_set=401 and cv.cdf_meaning ="ALPHA RESPON" join n where n.active_ind=1 and n.principle_type_cd=cv.code_value and n.beg_effective_dt_tm <= cnvtdatetime(curdate, curtime3) and n.end_effective_dt_tm >= cnvtdatetime(curdate, curtime3) and n.source_string != " " ELSEIF (PAR1 != "OTHER") from nomenclature n,code_value cv plan cv where cv.code_set=401 and cv.cdf_meaning ="ALPHA RESPON" join n where n.active_ind=1 and n.principle_type_cd=cv.code_value and n.beg_effective_dt_tm <= cnvtdatetime(curdate, curtime3) and n.end_effective_dt_tm >= cnvtdatetime(curdate, curtime3) and n.source_string != " " and CNVTUPPER(n.source_string)=PATSTRING(CONCAT(cnvtupper(PAR1),"*")) ELSE from nomenclature n,code_value cv plan cv where cv.code_set=401 and cv.cdf_meaning ="ALPHA RESPON" join n where n.active_ind=1 and n.principle_type_cd=cv.code_value and n.beg_effective_dt_tm <= cnvtdatetime(curdate, curtime3) and n.end_effective_dt_tm >= cnvtdatetime(curdate, curtime3) and n.source_string != " " and CNVTUPPER(substring(1,1,n.source_string)) NOT BETWEEN "0" AND "Z" ENDIF STRING = n.source_string ORDER cnvtupper(n.source_string)

templateDefinitions.name: EKS_PLAN_FIND_L
templateDefinitions.definition: Active plans POWERPLAN exist OPT_TIME_QUAL OPT_TIME_VALUE OPT_TIME_UNIT from current date/time for person OPT_LINK.
templateDefinitions.description: Active plans POWERPLAN exist OPT_TIME_QUAL OPT_TIME_VALUE OPT_TIME_UNIT from current date/time for person OPT_LINK.

templateDefinitions.name: EKS_PLAN_SUGGESTED_FIND_L
templateDefinitions.definition: Suggested plans POWERPLAN exist with status of OPT_STATUS and source tag OPT_SOURCE_TAG OPT_TIME_QUAL OPT_TIME_VALUE OPT_TIME_UNIT from current date/time for person OPT_LINK.
templateDefinitions.description: Suggested plans POWERPLAN exist with status of OPT_STATUS and source tag OPT_SOURCE_TAG OPT_TIME_QUAL OPT_TIME_VALUE OPT_TIME_UNIT from current date/time for person OPT_LINK.

templateDefinitions.name: EKS_EXEC_CCL_A
templateDefinitions.definition: Execute a program PROGRAM_NAME with parameters OPT_PARAM and link to OPT_LINK.

templateDefinitions.name: EKS_CE_CREATE_CODED_CE_A
templateDefinitions.definition: Create a STATUS, OPT_NORMALCY, EVENT_NAME result of VALUE1 OPT_UNITS_OF_MEASURE on the same encounter as LINK with OPT_COMMENT_TYPE of OPT_COMMENT and RESEND send this event back through Discern Expert. OPT_INHERIT_DYN_LABEL inherit the dynamic label, if one exisits.

templateDefinitions.name: EKS_SUGGEST_PLAN_A
templateDefinitions.definition: Add POWERPLAN for person LINK with OPT_COMMENTS and OPT_SOURCE_TAG.
templateDefinitions.description: Add POWERPLAN for person LINK with OPT_COMMENTS and OPT_SOURCE_TAG.

value.value: parser("select where 1=1 detail event_updt_id = @MESSAGE:[USR_PERSONID], log_misc1 = ^@MESSAGE:[COMMENT]^ go")
